name: Mobius Trips
description:
Our entry for LD47!

As the newest driver for Mobius Trips, pick up passengers from the Town of Mobius and drive them around. Careful, the road can be a mess at times.

You can find the instructions in game. Enjoy yourself! Note, the linux build is untested, I don't have a linux machine

Credits:
